name: Rice
description: Ours is a name reckoned among the leading manufacturers of matchless quality rice grains. Weâ€™re a professional in escalating high volumes of producing nutritious & non-polished rice across the globe.

name: Wheat
description: Being a respected exporter of wheat in the global agro-food products market, we abide by all international standards. Clients obtain superior quality wheat sourced from the best fields.

name: Tuna
description: The factory primary's product is Canned Tuna, packaged in three different weight classifications in easy open ends tin cans of 100 grams, 160 grams, and bulk options.

name: Sugar
description: Engaged in merchanting, wholesale distribution, and branded retail. Our strength in sourcing sugar lies in our relationship with top-tier producers and refined logistical networks.

name: Vegetable Oil
description: The company exports vegetable cooking oil, 100% refined, in retail (PET bottles) and Jerry Cans under private labeling. Over the past years, we have attained global excellence.

name: Specialty Crops
description: We have been steering the export of various pulses and specialty crops, especially in the Middle East and Africa, satisfying the high consumption demands of these regions.
